seniority_level.evidence: Title is generic Data Engineer and responsibilities span batch and real-time processing, predictive modeling and enterprise search, which suggests a mid‑level role rather than entry or senior.

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer and core duties involve data pipelines, integration, warehousing and ETL.

sub_specialty.evidence: Required expertise in Informatica PowerCenter, data warehousing and ETL points to a batch‑oriented ETL specialization.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management responsibilities or direct reports; focus is purely technical execution.

primary_cloud.evidence: Preferred technical experience explicitly mentions MS‑Azure Cloud.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers are referenced in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description references both batch processing and real‑time processing.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools such as Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, etc. are mentioned.

storage_layer.evidence: Emphasis on data warehousing, EDW and SOR indicates a warehouse‑centric storage model.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Kochi, Kerala, India with no remote‑work language.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in India, placing work in the APAC time zone region.

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation requirement is stated; the role is tied to a specific Indian city.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned and the role is located in India.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility or student visas.

citizenship_required.evidence: Only work‑authorization is implied; no citizenship restriction is described.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type (W2, C2C, 1099) is not specified in the posting.

benefits_level.evidence: The posting does not list any benefits such as health, PTO, equity, etc.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No discussion of career growth, ladders, or promotion tracks.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs or senior‑engineer guidance.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: The description does not contain language about promotions or advancement.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No reference to internal transfers or mobility within the organization.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track options (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: The posting separates must‑have skills from nice‑to‑have skills, indicating a balanced requirement level.

scope_definition.evidence: Responsibilities are specifically focused on data engineering tasks without ambiguity.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: The skill set aligns with a typical data engineer role; no unrealistic senior‑level expectations are present.
